title: Part C

title: Part D

title: Part E
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

The response must include a statement or indication of a moderate to high degree and an explanation.
descriptions: The response does not correctly explain the degree to which access to specialized women’s health care (i.e., gynecologic or obstetric care) in more developed countries is likely to affect a country’s total fertility rate using one of the following:
